statements: SELECT * FROM water_conservation_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, budget FROM water_conservation_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_initiatives WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM water_conservation_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, budget, end_date FROM water_conservation_initiatives ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_initiatives WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, initiative_name ASC
SELECT initiative_name, budget FROM water_conservation_initiatives WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' AND budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY initiative_id
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, budget FROM water_conservation_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC, initiative_id ASC
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM water_conservation_initiatives ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_initiatives WHERE budget < 5000 OR budget > 30000 ORDER BY initiative_name DESC
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date FROM water_conservation_initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, budget FROM water_conservation_initiatives WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM initiative_participants WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_conservation_initiatives WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM water_conservation_initiatives ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT * FROM initiative_participants JOIN water_conservation_initiatives ON initiative_participants.initiative_id = water_conservation_initiatives.initiative_id WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'M';

SELECT initiative_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM water_conservation_initiatives LEFT JOIN initiative_participants ON water_conservation_initiatives.initiative_id = initiative_participants.initiative_id GROUP BY water_conservation_initiatives.initiative_id;

SELECT initiative_name, participant_name, age, gender FROM initiative_participants LEFT JOIN water_conservation_initiatives ON initiative_participants.initiative_id = water_conservation_initiatives.initiative_id WHERE budget > 3000;
SELECT * FROM Water_Conservation_Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM Water_Conservation_Projects WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT project_name, end_date, budget FROM Water_Conservation_Projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage_Statistics WHERE liters_saved > 1000;
SELECT department_name, supervisor_name, phone_number FROM City_Departments WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, city, budget FROM Water_Conservation_Projects WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Conservation_Projects JOIN Water_Usage_Statistics ON Water_Conservation_Projects.project_id = Water_Usage_Statistics.project_id WHERE liters_saved > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, supervisor_name, phone_number FROM Water_Conservation_Projects, City_Departments WHERE Water_Conservation_Projects.city = City_Departments.city AND City_Departments.department_name = 'Public Works';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS project_count, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM Water_Conservation_Projects;
SELECT city, MAX(liters_saved) AS max_liters_saved FROM Water_Usage_Statistics GROUP BY city HAVING MAX(liters_saved) > 2000;
SELECT * FROM WaterConservationProjects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM WaterConservationProjects ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM WaterConservationProjects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM WaterConservationProjects WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, city, state FROM WaterConservationProjects JOIN ProjectLocations ON WaterConservationProjects.project_id = ProjectLocations.project_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM WaterConservationProjects;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM ProjectLocations ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT participant_name, role, contact_number FROM ProjectParticipants WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT progress_status, progress_details FROM ProjectProgress WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConservationProjects JOIN ProjectLocations ON WaterConservationProjects.project_id = ProjectLocations.project_id;
SELECT * FROM initiatives;
SELECT id, name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT id, location, head_of_department FROM departments WHERE location LIKE '%Office%';
SELECT * FROM initiatives;
SELECT name, description, start_date FROM initiatives;
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE budget > 100000;
SELECT d.name AS department_name, p.name AS project_name, p.budget FROM departments d JOIN projects p ON d.id = p.id;
SELECT ip.initiative_id, p.name AS project_name, r.report_date FROM initiatives_projects ip JOIN projects p ON ip.project_id = p.id JOIN reports r ON p.id = r.project_id;
